sentences.en: After reproduction of the viral nucleic acid the host cell usually undergoes lysis ( LYSOGENY ).
sentences.cn: 病毒核酸复制后寄主细胞通常要经历裂解过程 ( 溶源状态 ).

sentences.en: As the final lysis of his disease, his skin returned to its original color.
sentences.cn: 当他的疾病终于渐退, 他的皮肤恢复为原本的颜色.

sentences.en: At high calcium concentration they fuse without lysis.
sentences.cn: 在钙离子浓度高时,他们融合而不解体.

sentences.en: Hence, a successful industry ana - lysis will have to identify the underlying fac - tors driving demand and supply.
sentences.cn: 因此, 成功的行业分析,便须对那些影响供需的基本因素作出辨别.

sentences.en: However, the recovery of recombinant proteins hinges largely on the ability to effectively induce cell lysis.
sentences.cn: 然而, 重组蛋白的提取有赖于诱导细胞溶解的能力.

sentences.en: Hyperuricemia is associated with and progression of gout, cardiovascular diseases, tumor lysis syndrome and renal disease.
sentences.cn: 高尿酸血症与痛风 、 心血管疾病 、 肿瘤裂解综合征及肾脏疾病的引发或加剧密切相关.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore the risk factors and treatment of tumor lysis syndrome ( TLS ) .
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨肿瘤溶解 综合征 发生的危险因素及其治疗.

sentences.en: Objective To determine the optimal condition of lysis of influenza virus by sodium deoxycholate.
sentences.cn: 目的研究去氧胆酸钠对流感病毒最佳的裂解条件.

sentences.en: One inclusion was formed within the exosporium and remained with the spore after mother cell lysis.
sentences.cn: 电镜结果显示该晶体在芽胞外壁内侧形成,成熟后被包裹在芽胞外壁以内不脱落.

sentences.en: The computation of cars running on monocable circulating ropeway is a problem of dyn amic ana-lysis for geometrically nonlinear continuous systems.
sentences.cn: 单线循环式索道车斗运行过程的模拟计算，是个几何非线性连续系统的动力分析问题。

sentences.en: The lysis of the brain takes place only hours after death.
sentences.cn: 脑的细胞溶解,在死后的几小时就发生了.

sentences.en: The weather forecast, in synoptic meteorology, have three methods:pressure field ana-lysis, energy field analysis and entropy field analysis.
sentences.cn: 天气学天气预报经历着气压场分析方法，能量场分析方法和我们提出的熵场分析方法。

sentences.en: There are three main methods , drop collapse , oil spreading , and blood lysis, to detect biosurfactant production.
sentences.cn: 生物表面活性剂的检测方法主要有:液滴坍塌法 、 排油圈法和血平板法.

sentences.en: This leads to the loss of osmotic balance and ATP, and finally to cell lysis.
sentences.cn: 这会导致渗透不平衡和atp的散失, 并最终导致细胞的凋亡.

words.tran_cn: 生成细胞溶素的；溶原的；产噬的
细胞溶解；病势减退；消散

phrases.tran_cn: 细胞溶菌作用；胞溶作用

trans.tran_en: the destruction or dissolution of cells by the action of a particular lysin
